title: Person Of Interest Hightlights Season 1 Part 1/3
author: NZHiphopscaper
comment: One of the greatest TV dramas, ever.
I love Finch's scene going against the pharmaceutical company short selling the shares.
I don't know why Jim never got a Emmy for his work here . It's a shame .
This show uses the best songs for its episodes...their just so in sync.

How is every song selection in this entire show so perfect for the moment it's played? How can someone know all this music, know exactly where it fits, and get the job of deciding that? That person is a champion, a demigod of style.
description: Sorry for the delay but here it is. I put together my favourite scenes from Season 1 POI. Its just the scenes themselves there is no music over the top. I tried to tell it like a story (kind of), so every character gets showen once at the beginning, and then whatever there next big scene was I showed it next. The scenes are in order of episodes (I think). I tried to give all characters screen time but there is no doubting there is more Reese than anybody else. Sorry its so long, there is too many great scenes I didnt know what to leave out. Nothing fancy about this video, but its something. Hope you like it. :)
